# connect to cloudkarafka with vanilla kafka tools · GitHub (gist.github.com)

<https://gist.github.com/timvw/ac6779ba20f20d44fd334d7e40326a6f>

## Description

connect to cloudkarafka with vanilla kafka tools. GitHub Gist: instantly share code, notes, and snippets.

connect to cloudkarafka with vanilla kafka tools

[Raw](/timvw/ac6779ba20f20d44fd334d7e40326a6f/raw/b3a5a4505c329be2aed07ad74ab0258b209a2819/1_cloudkarafka-exports.sh){.Button--secondary .Button--small .Button view-component="true"}

![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,){.octicon .octicon-code-square .color-fg-muted}
[**1_cloudkarafka-exports.sh**](#file-1_cloudkarafka-exports-sh){.wb-break-all}

![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,){.octicon .octicon-alert}
This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters.
[Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters](https://github.co/hiddenchars){.Link--inTextBlock target="_blank"}

[Show hidden characters](%7B%7B%20revealButtonHref%20%7D%7D){.btn-sm .btn view-component="true"}

![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,){.octicon .octicon-alert}

  -- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
     #!/bin/bash
     \# Export variables if not set already
     export CLOUDKARAFKA_BROKERS=\"\${CLOUDKARAFKA_BROKERS:-ark-01.srvs.cloudkafka.com:9094,ark-02.srvs.cloudkafka.com:9094,ark-03.srvs.cloudkafka.com:9094}\"
     export CLOUDKARAFKA_USERNAME=\"\${CLOUDKARAFKA_USERNAME:-herecomesyourusername}\"
     export CLOUDKARAFKA_PASSWORD=\"\${CLOUDKARAFKA_PASSWORD:-herecomesyourpassword}\"
  -- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Raw](/timvw/ac6779ba20f20d44fd334d7e40326a6f/raw/b3a5a4505c329be2aed07ad74ab0258b209a2819/2_cloudkarafka-console-producer.sh){.Button--secondary .Button--small .Button view-component="true"}

![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,){.octicon .octicon-code-square .color-fg-muted}
[**2_cloudkarafka-console-producer.sh**](#file-2_cloudkarafka-console-producer-sh){.wb-break-all}

![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,){.octicon .octicon-alert}
This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters.
[Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters](https://github.co/hiddenchars){.Link--inTextBlock target="_blank"}

[Show hidden characters](%7B%7B%20revealButtonHref%20%7D%7D){.btn-sm .btn view-component="true"}

![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,){.octicon .octicon-alert}

  -- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
     #!/bin/bash
     
     \# Load cloudkarafka variables (if not set already)
     CLOUDKARAFKA_CONFIG_DIR=\${CLOUDKARAFKA_CONFIG_DIR:-\$(realpath \"\${0}\" \| xargs dirname)}
     source \"\${CLOUDKARAFKA_CONFIG_DIR}/cloudkarafka_exports.sh\"
     
     \# Verify that all required variables are set
     \[ -n \"\${KAFKA_HOME}\" \] \|\| (echo \"KAFKA_HOME is not set.\"; exit 1)
     \[ -n \"\${CLOUDKARAFKA_BROKERS}\" \] \|\| (echo \"CLOUDKARAFKA_BROKERS is not set.\"; exit 1)
     \[ -n \"\${CLOUDKARAFKA_USERNAME}\" \] \|\| (echo \"CLOUDKARAFKA_USERNAME is not set.\"; exit 1)
     \[ -n \"\${CLOUDKARAFKA_PASSWORD}\" \] \|\| (echo \"CLOUDKARAFKA_PASSWORD is not set.\"; exit 1)
     
     \# Build SASL config
     export SASL_SAAS_CONFIG=\"org.apache.kafka.common.security.scram.ScramLoginModule required username=\\\"\${CLOUDKARAFKA_USERNAME}\\\" password=\\\"\${CLOUDKARAFKA_PASSWORD}\\\";\"
     
     \$KAFKA_HOME/bin/kafka-console-producer.sh \\
     \--producer-property security.protocol=SASL_SSL \\
     \--producer-property sasl.mechanism=SCRAM-SHA-256 \\
     \--producer-property sasl.jaas.config=\"\${SASL_SAAS_CONFIG}\" \\
     \--broker-list \"\${CLOUDKARAFKA_BROKERS}\" \\
     \$@
  -- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Raw](/timvw/ac6779ba20f20d44fd334d7e40326a6f/raw/b3a5a4505c329be2aed07ad74ab0258b209a2819/3_cloudkarafka_console-consumer.sh){.Button--secondary .Button--small .Button view-component="true"}

![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,){.octicon .octicon-code-square .color-fg-muted}
[**3_cloudkarafka_console-consumer.sh**](#file-3_cloudkarafka_console-consumer-sh){.wb-break-all}

![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,){.octicon .octicon-alert}
This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters.
[Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters](https://github.co/hiddenchars){.Link--inTextBlock target="_blank"}

[Show hidden characters](%7B%7B%20revealButtonHref%20%7D%7D){.btn-sm .btn view-component="true"}

![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,){.octicon .octicon-alert}

  -- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
     #!/bin/bash
     
     \# Load cloudkarafka variables (if not set already)
     CLOUDKARAFKA_CONFIG_DIR=\${CLOUDKARAFKA_CONFIG_DIR:-\$(realpath \"\${0}\" \| xargs dirname)}
     source \"\${CLOUDKARAFKA_CONFIG_DIR}/cloudkarafka_exports.sh\"
     
     \# Verify that all required variables are set
     \[ -n \"\${KAFKA_HOME}\" \] \|\| (echo \"KAFKA_HOME is not set.\"; exit 1)
     \[ -n \"\${CLOUDKARAFKA_BROKERS}\" \] \|\| (echo \"CLOUDKARAFKA_BROKERS is not set.\"; exit 1)
     \[ -n \"\${CLOUDKARAFKA_USERNAME}\" \] \|\| (echo \"CLOUDKARAFKA_USERNAME is not set.\"; exit 1)
     \[ -n \"\${CLOUDKARAFKA_PASSWORD}\" \] \|\| (echo \"CLOUDKARAFKA_PASSWORD is not set.\"; exit 1)
     
     \# Build SASL config
     export SASL_SAAS_CONFIG=\"org.apache.kafka.common.security.scram.ScramLoginModule required username=\\\"\${CLOUDKARAFKA_USERNAME}\\\" password=\\\"\${CLOUDKARAFKA_PASSWORD}\\\";\"
     
     \$KAFKA_HOME/bin/kafka-console-consumer.sh \\
     \--consumer-property security.protocol=SASL_SSL \\
     \--consumer-property sasl.mechanism=SCRAM-SHA-256 \\
     \--consumer-property sasl.jaas.config=\"\${SASL_SAAS_CONFIG}\" \\
     \--bootstrap-server \"\${CLOUDKARAFKA_BROKERS}\" \\
     \$@
  -- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Author

###  {#section .f5 .text-normal style="flex: 1 1 auto"}

**[timvw](/timvw){.author .Link--primary .text-bold .css-overflow-wrap-anywhere hovercard-type="user" hovercard-url="/users/timvw/hovercard" octo-click="hovercard-link-click" octo-dimensions="link_type:self"}**
commented
[Oct 17, 2019](/timvw/ac6779ba20f20d44fd334d7e40326a6f?permalink_comment_id=3057903#gistcomment-3057903){#gistcomment-3057903-permalink .Link--secondary .js-timestamp}

Using these scripts you can now produce and consume from [cloudkarafka](https://www.cloudkarafka.com/){rel="nofollow"}

``` notranslate
./cloudkarafka-console-producer.sh --topic my8ndu1i-test
```

``` notranslate
./cloudkarafka-console-consumer.sh --topic my8ndu1i-test --from-beginning
```
